title: Pessat slot booking starting when?
content:
It was supposed to start today (17) but has not started yet please help me regarding this

All opinions are appreciated

comments.body: Let me know if it starts

It's started but I don't know my username and password. They never sent it as an email either, most exams do send it. 

And if I put forgot username, it says it has sent an email but I haven't received anything. Lmao.
